answers.author: Stewart Fairburn
answers.text:
Midwest City Oklahoma has a rental registration program with reduced rates if it meets the crime free program requirements.

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
A member is working on an initiative to improve its housing rental licensing program to better serve the community.  The organization is looking for examples of programs where licensing fees are reduced when certain criteria designed to reduce problems and calls for service to their establishments are met.     
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Rental License Fee Reduction Program
